name: Invest Saint Lucia
description: National investment promotion agency. One-stop shop for foreign investors. Assists with permits, incentives, and business facilitation.
address: 1st Floor, Heraldine Rock Building, Waterfront, Castries

name: Registry of Companies and Intellectual Property (ROCIP)
description: Handles company incorporation, business name registration, annual filings, and corporate records. Also handles intellectual property registration.
address: 2nd Floor, Francis Compton Building, Waterfront, Castries

name: Attorney General's Chambers
description: Oversees legal affairs, legislation, and the incorporation process. Draft license reviews and legal advisory.

name: Inland Revenue Department
description: Administers income tax, VAT, withholding tax, and other tax obligations. Issues TINs, processes tax returns.

name: National Insurance Corporation (NIC)
description: Manages social insurance scheme. Employer and employee registration, contribution collection, benefit administration.

name: Saint Lucia Customs & Excise Department
description: Handles import/export clearance, duty collection, trade facilitation, and border control.

name: Financial Intelligence Authority (FIA)
description: Oversees anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing compliance. Receives suspicious transaction reports.

name: Trade Export Promotion Agency (TEPA)
description: Promotes Saint Lucian exports, assists exporters with market access, trade fairs, and export documentation.

name: Development Control Authority (DCA)
description: Issues building permits, handles zoning, physical planning, and environmental impact assessments.

name: Government of Saint Lucia Web Portal
description: Central government website with access to services, forms, and information across all ministries.

name: Saint Lucia Chamber of Commerce, Industry & Agriculture
description: The main business organization. Networking, advocacy, business support, trade missions.

name: Saint Lucia Hotel & Tourism Association (SLHTA)
description: Represents the tourism private sector. Advocacy, training, marketing, and member services.

name: Ministry of Commerce
description: Trade policy, business licensing, regulation.

name: Immigration Department
description: Work permits, residence permits, visa processing.

name: Department of Labour
description: Labour market testing, work permit support, employment standards.

name: Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA)
description: Independent statutory body regulating non-bank financial institutions: insurance, credit unions, MSBs, pension funds, international banks, IBCs, mutual funds, and registered agents.

name: Saint Lucia Air and Sea Ports Authority (SLASPA)
description: Manages all airports and seaports. Oversees Hewanorra, George FL Charles, Port Castries, and Vieux Fort port.

name: Saint Lucia Tourism Authority (SLTA)
description: National tourism marketing and promotion agency.

name: Bank of Saint Lucia (BOSL)
description: Largest locally incorporated commercial bank. Full retail and corporate banking, investment banking, mobile banking, DCash integration. 5 branches, 30 ATMs island-wide.

name: 1st National Bank St. Lucia Limited
description: Oldest national bank (est. 1938). Acquired RBC operations in 2021. Twice named 'Bank of the Year' by the Financial Times. Dedicated MSME Competency Unit.

name: CIBC Caribbean
description: Subsidiary of Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce. Presence since 1837. Rebranded to CIBC Caribbean in January 2024. Corporate banking, wealth management, credit cards.

name: Republic Bank (EC) Limited
description: Subsidiary of Republic Financial Holdings (Trinidad). Acquired Scotiabank's EC operations in 2019. Head office for all EC operations in Saint Lucia.

name: First Citizens (St. Lucia) Limited
description: Subsidiary of First Citizens Group, Trinidad. Personal, business, and corporate banking. Investment services through First Citizens Investment Services.

name: PROVEN Bank (Saint Lucia) Limited
description: Class A international banking license. Serves IBCs and international clients with multicurrency accounts, term deposits, credit cards, and international wire transfers.

name: Hermes Bank Limited
description: Class A international banking license (est. 2012). 24/7 online banking, multicurrency accounts (USD, EUR, GBP, CNY, RUB). Popular with CBI investors.

name: Eastern Caribbean Central Bank (ECCB)
description: Monetary authority for 8 ECCU states. Manages the XCD currency (pegged to USD at 2.70:1). Supervises commercial banks. HQ in Basseterre, St Kitts.

name: Saint Lucia Development Bank (SLDB)
description: Government-owned statutory corporation (est. 2009). Financing for agriculture, fisheries, housing, education, tourism, industry, SME development, and renewable energy.

name: FOSTERS
description: One of the longest-serving and largest law firms in the Eastern Caribbean (est. 1988). Only firm with two King's Counsel. Civil/commercial litigation, corporate law, banking, insurance, shipping.

name: Floissac, Du Boulay & Thomas
description: Band 1 ranked by Chambers. Lex Mundi Member. 60 years experience, 12 lawyers. Represents all commercial banks in Saint Lucia.

name: McNamara & Co.
description: Established 1975. Corporate/commercial services, receiverships, liquidations. Also operates McNamara Corporate Services for IBC formation.

name: Gordon, Gordon & Co.
description: Attorneys at Law, Notaries Royal, Patent & Trademark Agents. Specializes in real estate, banking, and intellectual property law.

name: Nicholas John & Co.
description: Full-service firm serving local, regional, and international clients for 40+ years. CBI expertise, corporate/commercial, IP, banking, real estate.
address: Hewanorra House, Trou Garnier Financial Centre, Pointe Seraphine, Castries

name: Amicus Law Chambers
description: Dynamic, full-service law firm with head office in Rodney Bay. Corporate and commercial law, litigation, conveyancing.
address: Suite No. 2, Rodney Bayside Building, Rodney Bay

name: Theodore & Associates
description: Leading firm in Castries. Full range of civil law services including conveyancing, High Court, and appellate representation.

name: RDM Chambers
description: Civil litigation, corporate/commercial law, conveyancing, employment law, and intellectual property.

name: Grant Thornton St. Lucia
description: Member of one of the world's largest professional services networks. Assurance, tax, and advisory services.

name: PKF St. Lucia
description: Multi-disciplinary advisory practice. Audit, tax, finance, and business advisory. Also operates PKF Corporate Services Ltd., a licensed IBC Registered Agent.
address: 1st Floor, Meridian Place, Choc Estate, Castries

name: BDO Eastern Caribbean (Saint Lucia)
description: 5th largest accounting network worldwide. Assurance, accounting, tax, business advisory, valuations, M&A support.

name: Ernst & Young (EY) Saint Lucia
description: Global Big Four accounting firm. Audit, tax, advisory, and transaction services.
address: 2nd Floor, Mardini Building, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: KPMG (Eastern Caribbean)
description: Part of KPMG Islands Group. Audit, tax, and advisory services.

name: Strachan Thorpe & Associates
description: Chartered accountants. Audit, business assurance, budget forecasting, bookkeeping, management consulting.

name: Felix Chitolie Tax & Management Consultants
description: Comprehensive financial services. Tax planning and preparation, accounting, training for individuals and businesses.

name: Terra Caribbean (Saint Lucia)
description: 80+ years combined experience. Property sales, rentals, management, and valuations. Office space, commercial, and residential.

name: Paradise Properties St. Lucia
description: Residential, commercial, and land purchases. Vacation and long-term rentals.

name: Coral Reef Real Estate
description: Property sales, commercial properties, commercial rentals, and luxury villa rentals.

name: Realty St. Lucia / Micha Landers
description: Premier real estate agent specializing in high-end homes and investment properties. All districts covered.

name: St. Lucia Homes
description: Land, commercial and house sales, short-term and long-term rentals.

name: Roseville Real Estate Services
description: Leading realtor with eighteen years experience. Residential and commercial property transactions.

name: St. Lucia Great Property Deals
description: Luxury homes, condos, land, and commercial properties. Complete one-stop service.

name: Colonial Trust Company Ltd.
description: Registered Trustee and Registered Agent services. IBC, IMF, and IBT formation. Serves clients within and outside the Caribbean.
address: Suite No. 2, Rodney Bayside Building, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: McNamara Corporate Services Inc.
description: IBC formation and management, structuring of international banks, mutual funds, and captive insurance. Full corporate administration.

name: FortGate Offshore Investment & Legal Services Ltd.
description: Offshore company incorporation, registration, and financial services. Also maintains a London office.
address: 1st Floor, The Sotheby Building, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: PKF Corporate Services Ltd.
description: Licensed IBC Registered Agent. Company formation, registered office, corporate administration, and compliance.

name: Sagicor (Life & General)
description: Leading financial services company. Life, health, car, home, travel, accident insurance, and employee benefits.

name: Jeffrey & Jeffrey Ltd. (Guardian Agent)
description: Agent of Guardian General Insurance and Guardian Life. All classes of general insurance, large life & health portfolio.

name: CG United Insurance (Saint Lucia)
description: Leading regional provider. Car, home, commercial property, cargo insurance.
address: J.E. Bergasse Building, Vide Bouteille, Castries

name: NAGICO (St. Lucia) Limited
description: Regional insurer. Motor, property, liability, and commercial insurance.

name: EC Global Insurance Agency
description: Range of general insurance products for individuals and businesses.

name: St. Lucia Motor & General Insurance Co. Ltd.
description: Indigenous company (est. 1988). Known for speedy claims settlement, competitive rates.

name: CMA CGM St. Lucia Ltd.
description: 100% subsidiary of CMA CGM Group. Container shipping, ocean freight, and logistics.

name: Tropical Shipping St. Lucia Ltd.
description: Major Caribbean shipping line. Regular container and cargo service from the USA and Caribbean ports.
address: WIBDECO Building, Cnr Manoel & Jeremie Streets, Castries

name: M&C Shipping (Minvielle & Chastanet Group)
description: Part of M&C Group (est. 1864). Shipping agency services, port handling, and logistics.

name: West Indies Shipping & Trading Co. Ltd.
description: Shipping, freight forwarding, and trading services. Import and export cargo.

name: Geest Line
description: Sails from Portsmouth (UK) and Flushing (Netherlands) to Castries. All cargo types including reefer and break bulk.

name: Superior Shipping Services Ltd.
description: Air freight, customs brokerage, and ocean freight services. Import/export clearance.

name: Mampa Employment Agency
description: 15+ years experience. Hospitality industry (cruise, hotels, restaurants, casinos) and land-based international employment.

name: Hired Caribbean
description: Connects job seekers to opportunities across the Caribbean. 50,000+ database. Jobs, scholarships, tenders.

name: eMagine Solutions Inc.
description: Software development and web applications. Mobile-first, responsive applications. Enterprise software, UI/UX, integrations.

name: CNSS Inc.
description: Leading IT solutions consultants and certification center. Data recovery, hardware, networking, security (CCTV). Cisco partner.

name: RedFin Ltd.
description: IT solutions for St. Lucia and wider Caribbean. IT assessments and customized solutions.

name: itel International (Saint Lucia)
description: Major BPO operator, 3,500+ employees across 6 countries. Three sites in Hewanorra Free Zone. Legal, FinTech, Medical CX services.
address: HF4 Hewanorra Free Zone, Vieux Fort

name: Renee's Construction Co. Ltd.
description: 25+ years experience. Civil engineering and construction. Industrial to tourism/leisure projects.

name: ECMC Ltd.
description: Civil, structural, forensic engineering. Construction management, surveying, property valuation, project management.
address: 1st Floor, Marie-Colette Building, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: Blueprint Construction Ltd.
description: Construction, project management, and related services.

name: FDL Consult Inc.
description: Engineering, architectural, and business consultancy (est. 2004). Solar PV design and installation.

name: RLB (Rider Levett Bucknall) â€” Saint Lucia
description: Global quantity surveying and construction consulting firm. Cost management, project management, advisory.

name: Jade Mountain / Anse Chastanet
description: Ultra-luxury resort in Soufriere with iconic Piton views. Award-winning architecture and dining.

name: Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort
description: Luxury beachfront resort between the Pitons. Private beach (Jalousie). Rainforest setting.

name: Sandals Grande St. Lucian Spa & Beach Resort
description: Premium all-inclusive resort on Pigeon Island Causeway. Conference space and business facilities. Part of Sandals chain.

name: Royalton Saint Lucia Resort & Spa
description: All-inclusive luxury resort (Marriott All-Inclusive). Conference facilities. Includes adults-only Hideaway (166 suites).

name: Bay Gardens Beach Resort & Spa
description: Collection of three hotels in Rodney Bay Village. Seven conference facilities. Preferred for corporate events.

name: Marigot Bay Resort & Marina
description: Luxury resort with marina facilities in protected Marigot Bay harbor.

name: Fond Doux Resort & Plantation
description: Eco-resort on working cocoa plantation. Heritage cottages amid tropical gardens.

name: Harbor Club, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Hilton-branded hotel with 7,000+ sq ft meeting space. 5 meeting rooms, conference center. Rodney Bay.

name: Windjammer Landing Resort & Residences
description: 60-acre luxury resort in Labrelotte Bay. Member of The Leading Hotels of the World. Corporate retreats.

name: Bel Jou Hotel
description: Business-oriented hotel near George FL Charles Airport. Two meeting spaces (900 sq ft + 2,000 sq ft). Caribbean views.

name: Coco Palm Resort
description: Colonial-style boutique hotel in Rodney Bay Village. French Creole decor. Two restaurants. Business travelers.

name: Sandals Halcyon Beach Resort
description: Intimate couples-only Sandals resort on Choc Beach. Garden and beachfront rooms.

name: Sandals Regency La Toc Resort
description: Sandals resort at La Toc. 9-hole golf course, spa, multiple restaurants. Hilltop and beach views.

name: Ladera Resort
description: Award-winning boutique resort perched on a volcanic ridge between the Pitons. Open-wall suites with plunge pools. UNESCO views.

name: Calabash Cove Resort & Spa
description: Adults-only luxury boutique resort in the north. Swim-up suites, infinity pool, beach.

name: LUCELEC (St. Lucia Electricity Services)
description: Sole electricity provider. 432 GWh generation, 88.4MW peak demand. Commercial connections for business premises.

name: WASCO (Water & Sewerage Company)
description: Water and sewerage services provider. Commercial connections available.

name: Flow (Cable & Wireless)
description: Major telecom provider. Fixed line, broadband internet, mobile (4G LTE), and TV services.

name: Digicel
description: Mobile and data services. 4G LTE network. Prepaid and postpaid plans. Business solutions.

name: Castries
description: Capital and largest city. Commercial, administrative, and shipping hub. Population ~22,000 (metro ~65,000).

name: Gros Islet
description: Main tourism district. Rodney Bay, luxury resorts, national stadium, northern beaches. Friday Night Jump-Up.

name: Vieux Fort
description: Southernmost town and second-largest settlement. International airport, free zone, growing commercial area.

name: Soufriere
description: Original French capital. Home to The Pitons (UNESCO), Sulphur Springs, eco-tourism. Major landmark destination.

name: Dennery
description: Eastern (Atlantic) coast. Agricultural and fishing community. Dennery Fish Fiesta.

name: Micoud
description: Large agricultural district on eastern coast. Bananas, coconut, cocoa production.

name: Choiseul
description: Arts and crafts heritage, pottery tradition, agricultural communities.

name: Laborie
description: Picturesque southern fishing village. Strong community identity, Creole culture.

name: Anse la Raye
description: West coast fishing town. Famous Friday Night Seafood Street Party.

name: Canaries
description: Smallest district between Anse la Raye and Soufriere. Rural community, coastal scenery.

name: Hewanorra International Airport (UVF)
description: Main international airport in Vieux Fort. Serves all major international flights. Modernization project underway.

name: George F.L. Charles Airport (SLU)
description: Regional/domestic airport at Vigie, Castries. Inter-island flights. Close to city center.

name: Port Castries
description: Main cargo port and cruise ship terminal. GPH US$135M redevelopment. 2 cruise berths, 6 cargo berths.

name: Rodney Bay Marina
description: Yacht marina and boat services. Haul-out, repairs, chandlery. ARC finish line.

name: Marigot Bay Marina
description: Protected natural harbor. Luxury marina facilities, chandlery, customs clearance.

name: Vieux Fort Port
description: Southern cargo port with finger pier and Liebherr mobile harbour crane. Services Troumassee solar project.

name: The Pitons (UNESCO World Heritage)
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site. Twin volcanic spires â€” Gros Piton (770m) and Petit Piton (743m). Iconic symbol of St. Lucia.

name: Sulphur Springs Park
description: World's only drive-in volcano. Fumaroles, hot springs, mud baths. Major tourist attraction.

name: Pigeon Island National Landmark
description: 44-acre historic park connected by causeway. Fort Rodney ruins, beaches, hiking trails. Events venue (Jazz Festival).

name: Diamond Falls Botanical Gardens
description: Botanical gardens with stunning waterfall and mineral baths. Oldest estate in Soufriere.

name: Tet Paul Nature Trail
description: Moderate nature trail with spectacular Piton views. Heritage site with interpretive signage. 45-min walk.

name: Toraille Waterfall
description: 15m waterfall cascading into a garden pool. Easy access from road. Popular swimming spot.

name: Rainforest Sky Rides (Aerial Tram)
description: Aerial tram through tropical rainforest canopy. Zip-line also available. Educational nature tours.

name: Fond Doux Cocoa Plantation
description: Working 250-year-old cocoa plantation. Chocolate-making demonstrations, estate tours, organic farm-to-table dining.

name: Gros Piton Hike Trailhead
description: Starting point for Gros Piton summit hike (770m). Mandatory guide required. 4-6 hour round trip. Challenging.

name: Daren Sammy Cricket Ground
description: International cricket venue. Named after West Indies captain Daren Sammy. Hosts CPL T20 matches. Capacity ~15,000.

name: Castries Central Market
description: Central produce market. Local food, spices, crafts. Cultural and commercial landmark. Saturday is busiest day.

name: La Place Carenage
description: Waterfront shopping and dining complex with Castries harbour views. Duty-free shops, restaurants.

name: Pointe Seraphine
description: Duty-free shopping complex at cruise terminal. Jewelry, fashion, souvenirs, professional offices.

name: JQ Mall
description: Main shopping centre in Rodney Bay. Retail, dining, supermarket, cinema.

name: Baywalk Mall
description: Shopping and dining complex in Rodney Bay.

name: Gablewoods Mall
description: Shopping centre and commercial offices on the outskirts of Castries.

name: Vieux Fort Industrial Free Zone
description: Manufacturing, warehousing, duty-free zone. Home to BPO operations and light manufacturing.

name: Cul de Sac Industrial Area
description: Industrial zone with petroleum terminal, LUCELEC power station, warehousing.

name: Morne Fortune
description: Government House, Fort Charlotte, SALCC campus. Historic hilltop area overlooking Castries.

name: Owen King EU Hospital (OKEU)
description: 160-bed public hospital (replaced Victoria Hospital 2022). A&E, ICU, surgery, imaging. Main public hospital.

name: Tapion Hospital
description: 32-bed private hospital. Specialist consultations, surgery, diagnostics. Popular with expatriates.

name: St. Jude Hospital
description: Southern region hospital. $75M reconstruction (Phase 2). Emergency, maternity, general medicine.

name: Soufriere Hospital
description: District hospital serving Soufriere and surrounding communities. Basic emergency and outpatient services.

name: Dennery Hospital
description: Small district hospital on the east coast. Outpatient and basic emergency services.

name: Sir Arthur Lewis Community College (SALCC)
description: Main tertiary institution. Business, IT, hospitality, arts programmes. Named after Nobel Laureate Sir Arthur Lewis.

name: UWI Open Campus â€” Saint Lucia
description: University of the West Indies distance and online learning centre. Degree programmes, continuing education.

name: Reduit Beach
description: Most popular beach in the north. White sand, calm waters, water sports, beach bars. Adjacent to Rodney Bay hotels.

name: Vigie Beach
description: Long sandy beach near George FL Charles Airport. Calm waters, accessible from Castries. Local favorite.

name: Anse Chastanet Beach
description: Dark-sand beach at foot of Jade Mountain. World-class snorkeling and diving. Coral reef directly offshore.

name: Sugar Beach (Jalousie)
description: White-sand beach between the Pitons. Accessed via Sugar Beach resort but open to public. Iconic Caribbean scene.

name: Anse Cochon Beach
description: Secluded west coast beach south of Anse la Raye. Good snorkeling, boat access or steep hike.

name: Marigot Beach
description: Small beach within Marigot Bay. Calm protected waters, water taxi access.

name: Pigeon Island Beach
description: Two beaches within Pigeon Island National Landmark. Historic setting, calm waters, picnic facilities.

name: Cas en Bas Beach
description: Remote Atlantic beach on the northeast coast. Popular for kitesurfing and horseback riding. Rugged scenery.

name: Grande Anse Beach
description: Long Atlantic-facing beach in the northeast. Turtle nesting site (leatherback). Powerful waves â€” swimming not recommended.

name: Sandy Beach
description: Long beach near Hewanorra Airport at the southern tip. Windy, good for windsurfing and kitesurfing.

name: Anse Chastanet Reef (Dive Site)
description: World-class reef dive directly offshore from Anse Chastanet Beach. 150+ fish species, coral walls, easy shore entry.

name: Coral Gardens (Dive Site)
description: Shallow coral gardens near Anse Chastanet. Ideal for beginners and snorkelers. Rich marine life.

name: Superman's Flight (Dive Site)
description: Spectacular wall dive between the Pitons. Strong currents create drift dive â€” feels like flying. Advanced divers.

name: Lesleen M Wreck (Dive Site)
description: Deliberately sunk 50ft freighter in Anse Cochon bay. 60ft depth. Coral-encrusted, abundant marine life. All levels.

name: British High Commission
description: UK diplomatic representation in Saint Lucia. Consular services, visa information.

name: Embassy of the Republic of China (Taiwan)
description: Taiwan diplomatic representation. Development cooperation, scholarships, trade promotion.

name: Massy Stores (Rodney Bay)
description: Major supermarket chain. Full grocery, pharmacy, household goods. Largest branch in north.

name: Massy Stores (Castries / La Clery)
description: Major supermarket branch in Castries area. Grocery, pharmacy, household goods.

name: Cost-U-Less
description: US-style wholesale club. Bulk groceries, household, electronics. Largest wholesale retailer on island.

name: Julian's Supermarket (IGA)
description: Independent supermarket with IGA affiliation. Full grocery, bakery, deli. Local and imported goods.

name: Rubis Gas Station (Rodney Bay)
description: Major fuel brand. Petrol, diesel, convenience store.

name: SOL Gas Station (Castries)
description: SOL petroleum fuel station. Petrol, diesel.

name: Cool Breeze Jeep/Car Rental
description: Local car rental company. Jeeps, cars, and SUVs. Delivery to airport and hotels.

name: Drive-A-Matic Car Rentals
description: Established car rental company. Airport pick-up, various vehicle types. Temporary driving permits arranged.

name: Massy Stores Rodney Bay
description: Major supermarket chain - Rodney Bay location

name: Massy Stores La Clery
description: Major supermarket chain - Castries location

name: Enbas Saut Falls
description: Scenic twin waterfalls accessible via moderate rainforest hike in the Edmund Forest Reserve

name: Gros Piton Trail
description: Challenging hike to the summit of Gros Piton (798m). Guide required. 4-5 hours round trip.

name: Rainforest Adventures - Aerial Tram
description: Aerial tram ride through rainforest canopy with zip-line option. Includes nature trail.

name: Vieux Fort Free Zone
description: Designated free trade zone near Hewanorra Airport for manufacturing and export businesses

name: Cul de Sac Industrial Estate
description: Major industrial and warehousing area for St. Lucia businesses

name: French Embassy
description: Embassy of France in Saint Lucia

name: Keyhole Pinnacles
description: Deep dive site with dramatic underwater pinnacles and abundant marine life near Soufriere

name: Marigot Bay
description: Picturesque sheltered bay known as one of the most beautiful in the Caribbean. Marina and resort.

name: The Coal Pot Restaurant
description: Award-winning French-Creole fusion restaurant set on the waterfront at Vigie Marina. Known for fresh seafood and romantic ambiance.

name: Jacques Waterfront Dining
description: Upscale waterfront restaurant at Rodney Bay Marina offering contemporary French cuisine with Caribbean flair.

name: Dasheene at Ladera
description: Acclaimed open-air restaurant at Ladera Resort with panoramic Pitons views. Innovative Caribbean cuisine using local ingredients.

name: The Cliff at Cap Maison
description: Cliff-edge fine dining at Cap Maison resort, accessible via a dramatic torch-lit staircase. Contemporary Caribbean-European menu.
address: Cap Maison, Smugglers Cove Drive, Cap Estate

name: Naked Fisherman Beach Bar & Grill
description: Relaxed beachfront restaurant at Cap Maison. Fresh seafood, grilled dishes, and cocktails on a secluded beach.

name: Pink Plantation House
description: Charming 19th-century plantation house restaurant in the hills above Castries. Creole-European cuisine with panoramic sea views.

name: Big Chef Steakhouse
description: Popular steakhouse and grill at Rodney Bay. Steaks, ribs, burgers, and Caribbean dishes in a casual setting.
address: Reduit Beach Avenue, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: Boucan by Hotel Chocolat
description: Cacao-inspired dining at Hotel Chocolat's estate in Soufriere. Unique cocoa-infused dishes paired with estate chocolate.

name: Spice of India
description: Popular Indian restaurant at Rodney Bay offering authentic curries, tandoori dishes, and vegetarian options.

name: KFC Saint Lucia
description: International fried chicken chain with multiple locations across Saint Lucia including Castries, Rodney Bay, and Vieux Fort.

name: Subway Saint Lucia
description: International sandwich chain with locations at Rodney Bay and other areas.

name: Buzz Seafood & Grill
description: Popular seafood restaurant on Reduit Beach, Rodney Bay. Fresh catches, grilled meats, and Caribbean cocktails.
address: Reduit Beach, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: Hertz Saint Lucia
description: International car rental chain with desk at Hewanorra International Airport and Castries. Standard and SUV vehicles available.

name: Avis Saint Lucia
description: International car rental agency with offices at Hewanorra Airport and Castries. Wide range of vehicles from sedans to 4x4s.

name: Budget Rent A Car
description: International car rental chain with desk at Hewanorra Airport. Economy to full-size vehicles.

name: Drive-A-Matic
description: Established local car rental company with locations at both airports and Rodney Bay. Known for reliable service and competitive rates.

name: Cool Breeze Jeep / Car Rental
description: Local car and jeep rental company popular with visitors. SUVs and 4x4s suited for the island's hilly terrain.

name: Courtesy Car Rental
description: Long-established local car rental company with airport pickup. Sedans, SUVs, and minibuses available.

name: FedEx Saint Lucia
description: International express courier service for documents and packages. Offers domestic and worldwide shipping.

name: DHL Saint Lucia
description: Global express delivery and logistics. Door-to-door international courier service and customs brokerage.

name: M&C Home Depot
description: Major hardware and home improvement store. Building materials, tools, paint, plumbing, and electrical supplies.

name: St. Lucia Block & Tile
description: Local manufacturer and supplier of concrete blocks, tiles, and masonry products. Also supplies aggregates and ready-mix concrete.

name: Courts Saint Lucia
description: Caribbean home furnishing chain. Furniture, appliances, electronics, and mattresses with hire purchase financing.

name: Do It Center
description: Hardware store offering tools, building materials, paint, plumbing and electrical supplies for DIY and contractors.

name: People's Pharmacy
description: Well-established pharmacy chain with multiple locations across Saint Lucia. Prescription drugs, OTC medicines, and health products.

name: J.Q. Charles Pharmacy
description: Pharmacy and health store at JQ Mall. Prescription services, wellness products, and personal care items.
address: JQ Mall, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: M&C Drugstore
description: Pharmacy and drugstore with prescription services and a wide range of health, beauty, and personal care products.

name: Massy Stores - Gablewoods
description: Major supermarket location in the Gablewoods Mall area. Full grocery, deli, bakery, and pharmacy sections.

name: Massy Stores - Rodney Bay
description: Rodney Bay branch of the Caribbean-wide supermarket chain. Fresh produce, imported goods, and household items.

name: Julian's Supermarket
description: Independent supermarket in Soufriere serving the south of the island. Local and imported groceries.

name: Glace Supermarket
description: Supermarket on the Gros Islet Highway serving Castries and northern communities. Groceries and household items.

name: Body Inc Fitness Centre
description: Full-service fitness centre at Rodney Bay with weights, cardio equipment, and group fitness classes.

name: Energize Health & Fitness
description: Fitness centre with modern equipment, personal training, and group exercise classes.

name: The Workspace (TEPA)
description: Government-supported co-working and innovation space operated through TEPA for entrepreneurs and startups.

name: Domino's Pizza
description: International pizza chain offering delivery, carryout, and dine-in service to Rodney Bay and surrounding areas.

name: Rituals Coffee House
description: Caribbean's premier coffee house chain at Baywalk Mall, serving gourmet coffee, sandwiches, and pastries.

name: Spinnakers Beach Bar & Grill
description: Iconic beachfront restaurant on Reduit Beach, popular with locals and yachtsmen, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily.

name: Subway - Castries
description: Downtown Castries Subway location on Jeremie Street for quick made-to-order sandwiches and salads.

name: UPS (Parcels Express International)
description: UPS shipping services operated through Parcels Express International, handling parcel delivery and logistics.
address: Business Group Building, Mongiraud, Gros Islet

name: Aeropost International
description: Caribbean courier enabling customers to order from US stores with delivery to Saint Lucia. Also handles outbound international shipping.

name: Rodney Bay Medical Centre
description: Premier private medical clinic offering general practice, specialist consultations, and walk-in services at Providence Commercial Centre.

name: Vision Express Eye Care
description: Comprehensive eye care practice with five branches across Saint Lucia, offering optometry, ophthalmology, and contact lenses.
address: Orange Grove Plaza, Bois D'Orange, Gros Islet

name: The Marketplace - Rodney Bay Marina
description: Marina-based grocery store at IGY Rodney Bay Marina, specializing in yacht provisioning with fresh produce, wines, and spirits.
address: IGY Rodney Bay Marina, Rodney Bay

name: Everyday Smiles Dental Clinic
description: Established dental practice by Dr. Naomi J. Michel (DDS) with two locations: Castries and Rodney Bay (JQ Mall). General, cosmetic, and restorative dentistry.
address: 7 High Street, Castries (also JQ Mall, Rodney Bay)

name: Glace Kent & Associates - Dental Implant & Cosmetic Centre
description: Specialist dental practice in Rodney Bay offering dental implants, cosmetic dentistry, veneers, and oral surgery.

name: Rodney Bay Medical & Dental Centre
description: Combined medical and dental facility in Rodney Bay. General dentistry, check-ups, cleanings, fillings, extractions, and cosmetic work.

description: General dental practice by Dr. Atef Daniel on Micoud Street, Castries. Fillings, extractions, cleanings, and preventive care.

name: GB Family Dental
description: Family-oriented dental practice on High Street, Castries. General and preventive dentistry for all ages.

description: Full-service veterinary clinic in Gros Islet. Consultations, vaccinations, surgery, pet boarding, and emergency care.

name: Little Paws Pet Shop & Veterinary Clinic
description: Combined pet shop and veterinary clinic offering basic vet services, vaccinations, pet supplies, food, and accessories.

name: Emile Hair
description: Highly rated hair salon in Rodney Bay popular with expats. Cuts, colouring, highlights, treatments, and styling. 5-star reviews.

description: Men's barber salon at Evergreen Plaza, Rodney Bay. Haircuts, grooming, and styling services.

name: Creative Hands Salon
description: Established hair salon on Darling Road, Castries. Full range of services including cuts, styling, braiding, and treatments.

name: Frances Hair & Nail Salon
description: Hair and nail salon on Chaussee Road, Castries. Cuts, styling, manicures, pedicures, and nail art.

name: Sparkle Laundry
description: Self-service and drop-off laundry facility. Wash, dry, and fold services popular with yachties and visitors.

name: U Wash N Dry Cleaning Laundry
description: Laundry and dry cleaning service on Darling Road, Castries. Wash, dry, press, and dry cleaning for garments and linens.

name: Innovation St. Lucia - Commercial Laundry
description: Commercial laundry equipment supplier and services in Massade, Gros Islet. Serves hotels, restaurants, and businesses.

name: The Document Centre (J.E. Bergasse & Co.)
description: Full-service printing and copying centre in Vide Bouteille. Digital printing, wide-format banners, posters, business cards, brochures, and scanning.

name: Excel Marketing Services
description: Printing and marketing services on Cadet Street, Castries. Business stationery, flyers, brochures, promotional materials.

name: Spectrum Graphics SLU
description: Vinyl printing, laser engraving, custom signage, and personalized gifts in Vieux Fort. Vehicle wraps, storefront signs, and banners.

name: Pigeon Island National Landmark - Wedding Venue
description: Iconic wedding and event venue managed by the Saint Lucia National Trust. Historic ruins, beach ceremonies, up to 50 guests. Packages from US$345.
address: Pigeon Island National Landmark, Gros Islet

name: Balenbouche Estate
description: Historic 18th-century sugar plantation estate near Laborie. Weddings amid ancient ruins, tropical gardens, and secluded beaches. Packages from US$1,500.

name: The Landings Resort & Spa - Events
description: Luxury resort venue on Rodney Bay. Multiple event spaces including South Lawn (150 seated), beach areas, and Suru Lounge. Weddings and conferences.

name: Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort - Events
description: World-class luxury resort between the Pitons. Multiple venue spaces up to 200 guests: Great Lawn, beach pier, restaurant. Weddings and corporate events.

name: Santographi Photography
description: Professional wedding and event photographer based in Saint Lucia. Destination weddings, engagements, and lifestyle photography.

name: Belle Portwe Photography Studio
description: Professional photography studio at Gablewoods Mall, Castries. Portraits, passports, events, product photography, and video production.
address: Studio #15, Gablewoods Mall, Sunny Acres, Castries

name: Lanmen Photography
description: Specialist vacation and destination wedding photographer. Couples shoots, proposals, honeymoon sessions across Saint Lucia locations.

name: A Best Auto Repair
description: Insurance-approved auto repair garage in Babonneau area, Gros Islet. Mechanical repairs, bodywork, diagnostics, and insurance claims.

name: Andre's Auto Repairs
description: General auto repair and maintenance garage in the Vieux Fort area. Engine repair, servicing, and bodywork.

name: Auto Specialist
description: Insurance-approved auto specialist on the Bexon Highway. Mechanical and electrical diagnostics, repairs, and bodywork.

name: Autozone
description: Insurance-approved garage and auto parts in Bois d'Orange. Full mechanical repairs, bodywork, and vehicle parts supply.

name: St Lucia Electrical & Mechanical Services Ltd
description: Established electrical and mechanical contracting firm on Micoud Street, Castries. Electrical installations, plumbing, HVAC, and industrial services.

name: Plumbing & Building Services & Supplies
description: Plumbing contractor and building supplies store in Massade, Gros Islet. Plumbing installations, repairs, and retail supplies.

name: Plumbing Solutions
description: Residential and commercial plumbing contractor in Bonne Terre, Gros Islet. Installations, repairs, and maintenance.

name: A & G Electrical Contracting & Consultants
description: Electrical contracting and consulting firm on Chaussee Road, Castries. Wiring, installations, inspections, and consulting.

name: Saint Lucia Chamber of Commerce, Industry & Agriculture
description: Principal private-sector advocacy body. Business support, networking, trade facilitation, export promotion, and policy representation.
address: Orange Park Commercial Centre, Bois d'Orange, Gros Islet

name: Saint Lucia Hospitality & Tourism Association (SLHTA)
description: Industry association representing hotels, restaurants, attractions, and tourism stakeholders. Training, advocacy, and marketing.
address: #2 Alfiona Plaza, Rodney Heights, Gros Islet

name: Bar Association of Saint Lucia
description: Professional body for attorneys-at-law in Saint Lucia. Continuing legal education, ethics oversight, and member directory.

name: St. Lucia Medical & Dental Association (SLMDA)
description: Professional body for physicians, surgeons, and dentists. Continuing medical education, ethical standards, and healthcare advocacy.
address: 2nd Floor, Nurses Home, Victoria Hospital, La Toc Road, Castries

name: St. Lucia Employers' Federation (SLEF)
description: National employers' organization representing private-sector employers. Labour relations, HR advisory, training, and policy advocacy.

name: OECS Commission Headquarters
description: Headquarters of the Organisation of Eastern Caribbean States on Morne Fortune. Regional integration, economic union, and policy coordination for 11 member territories.

name: Embassy of Mexico
description: Mexican embassy in Vigie, Castries. Consular services, visa information, trade promotion, and development cooperation.

name: Embassy of Venezuela
description: Venezuelan embassy in Vigie, Castries. Consular services, economic cooperation, and PetroCaribe programme coordination.

name: Embassy of Cuba
description: Cuban embassy in Rodney Bay, Gros Islet. Consular services, medical cooperation programme, and cultural exchange.

name: Embassy of Brazil
description: Brazilian embassy at Mardini Building, Rodney Bay. Consular services, trade promotion, and cultural affairs.
address: 4th Floor, Mardini Building, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: US Embassy - Bridgetown (Saint Lucia liaison)
description: The US Embassy in Barbados serves Saint Lucia. US citizen services, visa applications (processed in Bridgetown), and trade inquiries.

name: Monroe College - Saint Lucia Campus
description: US-accredited university campus in Vide Bouteille, Castries. Business, criminal justice, IT, hospitality, and healthcare programmes. Associate and bachelor's degrees.

name: International American University (IAU) College of Medicine
description: Medical school in Vieux Fort offering MD programme. US-based parent institution. Clinical rotations at affiliated hospitals.

name: Spartan Health Sciences University
description: Established medical school on St. Jude's Highway, Vieux Fort. MD programme with basic sciences on island, clinical rotations in US/UK-affiliated hospitals.
address: Spartan Drive, St. Jude's Highway, Vieux Fort

name: Arthur Lewis Community College (SALCC) - Vieux Fort Campus
description: Southern campus of SALCC in Vieux Fort. Vocational, technical, and associate degree programmes serving the south of the island.

name: St. Mary's College
description: Prestigious Roman Catholic secondary school in Castries, founded 1890. Strong academic tradition. CXC/CAPE examinations.

name: Sampsons Dental
description: Dental clinic on Chaussee Road, Castries. General dentistry, cleanings, fillings, and extractions.

name: Gros Islet Polyclinic
description: Government health centre in Gros Islet. Primary care, vaccinations, maternal health, and community health services.

name: Castries Health Centre
description: Government primary care health centre in central Castries. Walk-in consultations, vaccinations, maternal and child health.

name: Scuba Steve's Diving
description: PADI dive centre offering guided dives, certification courses, and snorkel trips. Serves sites along the west coast from Rodney Bay.

name: Island Divers
description: Dive operator based at Anse Cochon Beach, Anse la Raye. Shore and boat dives, PADI courses, and snorkelling trips.
address: Anse Cochon Beach, Anse la Raye

name: Dive Fair Helen
description: Long-established dive operator running trips from Castries to west coast sites. PADI courses, night dives, and reef conservation programmes.

name: Action Adventure Divers
description: Dive centre at Hummingbird Beach Resort, Soufriere. Piton wall dives, reef dives, and PADI courses in the Soufriere Marine Management Area.

name: Scuba St. Lucia
description: Premier dive centre at Anse Chastanet/Jade Mountain resort. Shore diving from world-class reef, PADI 5-Star IDC, and underwater photography.

name: Frog's Diving
description: Dive operator based at Harmony Suites, Rodney Bay. Fun dives, PADI courses from Open Water to Divemaster, and snorkel tours.
address: Harmony Suites, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: Eastern Caribbean Diving
description: Dive centre at Rodney Bay Marina. Boat dives to west coast sites, PADI courses, wreck dives, and private charters.

name: Cas en Bas Beach
description: Secluded Atlantic beach on the northeast coast near Gros Islet. Popular for kitesurfing and horseback riding. Rugged natural scenery.

name: Anse des Sables (Sandy Beach)
description: Long white-sand beach at the southern tip near Hewanorra Airport. Consistent trade winds make it the island's top windsurfing and kitesurfing spot.

name: Laborie Beach
description: Charming black-sand beach in the fishing village of Laborie. Calm waters, local fish fry on Fridays, and authentic village atmosphere.

name: Anse Mamin Beach
description: Secluded volcanic-sand beach north of Anse Chastanet, Soufriere. Accessed via jungle trail or boat. Former plantation ruins, mountain biking trails.

name: Malgretoute Beach
description: Small beach near Jade Mountain and Sugar Beach resorts between the Pitons. Good snorkelling, volcanic sand, and dramatic Piton views.

name: High Commission of India
description: Indian High Commission accredited to Saint Lucia (resident in Port of Spain, Trinidad). Consular and visa services for Indian nationals and trade inquiries.
address: Port of Spain, Trinidad (serves Saint Lucia)

name: Canadian High Commission (Bridgetown - serves Saint Lucia)
description: Canadian High Commission in Barbados serves Saint Lucia. Canadian citizen services, immigration, visas, and trade inquiries.
address: Bishop's Court Hill, Bridgetown, Barbados (serves Saint Lucia)

name: Victoria Hospital Dental Unit
description: Government dental unit at the old Victoria Hospital campus, Castries. Basic dental care, extractions, and emergency dental services.

name: Ziggy's Hair Salon
description: Popular hair salon at JQ Mall, Rodney Bay. Full service salon for cuts, colouring, styling, and treatments. Well known among expat community.
address: JQ Mall, Rodney Bay, Gros Islet

name: MC Doom Enterprises Ltd
description: Automotive repair and swimming pool contracting in Bois d'Orange. Vehicle servicing, bodywork, and pool installation/maintenance.

name: RECS Plumbing Services
description: Plumbing contractor serving Massade, Gros Islet and surrounding areas. Installations, leak repairs, and bathroom/kitchen plumbing.

name: Sandals Halcyon Beach - Events & Conferences
description: All-inclusive resort in Choc Bay offering beach wedding packages and meeting rooms for corporate events. Dedicated wedding coordinator.

name: St. Lucia Shoots Photography
description: Professional event, wedding, and portrait photography service covering all Saint Lucia. Real estate photography also offered.

name: Saint Lucia Manufacturers Association (SLMA)
description: Representative body for local manufacturers. Promotes buy-local, product standards, export development, and manufacturing policy advocacy.

name: Islands Pharmacy - Rodney Bay
description: Pharmacy at Rodney Bay Village. Prescription drugs, OTC medicines, vitamins, health products, and personal care.

name: National Enrichment & Learning Unit (NELU)
description: Government adult and continuing education unit. Literacy programmes, skills training, GED equivalency, and community education across the island.

name: Captain Mike's Diving
description: Independent dive operator offering small-group dives, snorkel tours, and PADI certification courses from Smuggler's Cove area.

name: Anse la Raye Beach
description: Beach in the fishing village of Anse la Raye. Famous Friday night fish fry with grilled fish, lobster, and local rum. Cultural experience.

name: Consulate of Germany (Honorary)
description: Honorary Consulate of the Federal Republic of Germany in Castries. Passport and document assistance for German nationals.

name: Saint Lucia National Trust
description: Manages Pigeon Island National Landmark, Maria Islands, and other heritage sites. Environmental conservation, education, and cultural heritage preservation.

name: Vieux Fort Health Centre
description: Government health centre in Vieux Fort serving the southern region. Primary care, maternal health, vaccinations, and community health outreach.

name: Emily's Beauty Supply & Hair Salon
description: Hair salon and beauty supply store on Brazil Street, Castries. Styling, braiding, weaves, and beauty products retail.
